Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Visiting Amsterdam on a rainy November Sunday and headed here for dinner.   Very much a small family restaurant with about 8 tables.  I went about 530 and it was empty but started filling up around 615 so I would consider a reservation.  I had a lamb dish which was excellent.  An enjoyable dinner with out of the ordinary food.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: We ate in Kilimanjaro while visiting Amsterdam with my sister last week. None of us had Ethiopian food previously but will definitely be having it more often now. Food in Kilimanjaro was full of flavour, fresh and exciting. We had mixed …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: We found this lovely little restaurant by chance on our first evening in Amsterdam. The food was absolutely amazing (and great for vegetarians) and the family running it is lovely. We hadn't booked a table, but we arrived early and they …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text:
Unusual tastes, like home atmosphere, with a lot of visual artifacts around, and Ethiopian psychedelic music in the background.
Making food takes time, be patient. If you're in a hurry, better find another …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: After a very long day of strolling around in Amsterdam, my friends and me were looking for a nice restaurant to fill our empty stomaches. We found this restaurant near the city center. As soon as we entered this place we were welcomed by …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Familiar and cozy place, food simply delicious🤤 you know that feeling that you left home for dinner and continues in a family atmosphere?  this family of Ethiopian origin will not disappoint.  an experience that I recommend

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: The place is really good and very authentic. The food is not cheap but I think it’s a reasonable price to pay. The staff is very kind and helpful when chosing the dishes and the chef was so nice with us. Explained a lot of things. Definetly will come back

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Very tasty! Great food, friendly service and cosy restaurant.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Good food, good service and good price

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: An authentic small family restaurant that makes you feel very welcome! The waitress made every effort to create a unique dining experience. The food itself was truly special with flavours you won't find in a lot of other restaurants.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Great food and very friendly and helpful staff! The atmosphere was warm and welcoming, we had a great time. They also have a cool selection of African beer!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Wonderful very small family restaurant, been in business for 29 years. The food is very good and the family is very friendly and helpful. You will more than likely need a reservation for dinner because of the small size of the place. Enjoy!!!!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Really loved it! Decent prices and portions. Would have liked the food slighter more spicy but love we can get Ethiopian and other African food in the heart of Amsterdam. And the staff was super lovely! We got the mixed ingera and the piri …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: The people are extremely pleasant and the place very cosy. Apart from the eating style using the soury ingera dough there was a wide variety of african dishes to choose from. For a first go it was good but not exquisite, many dishes to try though!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Authentic ethiopian injera and dishes from other african countries. The place is cozy and beautiful decorated. The tamarind juice is a must try! Don't miss it!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text:
Kilimanjaro Restaurant

Although we arrived 10 minutes before closing time at the restaurant they …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: A very nice cozy place, traditional Ethiopian food and African also, but there is no traditional cafe corner, good service, nice lady.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: My friends and I went here for dinner in December and it was an almost magical experience. The three of us got the veggie sampler and the meat sampler to split and it was the perfect amount of food. The stews were flavorful and delicious, …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: A small gem hidden outside the busy center of Amsterdam. This quaint little restaurant not only offered a warm and friendly atmosphere, but also beautiful and affordable food. The menu can fit all needs, from crocodile to vegan and will be …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Amazing food with an extremely sweet staff. The vegetarian platter was delicious. The chef also brought out the roasting beans for us to smell as they were cooking. I highly recommend this restaurant especially if you are vegan.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Nice food, especially good if you fancy something different. Well worth a visit.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Great little restaurant, took the mixed plate of Ethiopian food and all the different tastes were just perfect, eating with the hands fits just right

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Great food and really lovely staff. Tried palm wine for the first time and it's really really good. The decor and vibe are super chilled. This was our 2nd time there and will be heading back next time I'm in Amsterdam.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Excellent food, try the variety platter. Extra injera is free. The prices are very reasonable, a meal for two people cost 29$. The waitstaff was very nice, quick, and accommodating. If you're wondering where to eat, look no further!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: The food was tasty and healthy! But the best part was the service. Our host radiates a wonderful warmth and kindness that makes the food even more enjoyable!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Amazing food and good portion sizes! The mother-daughter team running the restaurant are really lovely people with a clear passion for the food and drinks they serve! Good quality to price ratio and I would definitely recommend this restaurant!!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: You rock it! I love to order from here. One of my secret advices in Amsterdam.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Lovely place, food, ambient and service. Definitely to go often!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: We are longtime patrons in what every time feels like a unique experience. Happy staff, absolute outstanding food.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Really casual and warm atmosphere, the injeera is very delicious. Moreover the waitress was super friendly. I can highly recommend !

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: I thought I should submit a review to compensate for the negative one of Geoffrey. We were there last night and it was wonderful: great atmosphere, super nice service, good music (indeed) and great food. The place was full and it seemed to me everyone was enjoying their Injeerah as much as we were. Great place!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Good food, good service and good price

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Great service, starters were amazing but filled up to much on banana beer to fully appreciate the selection offered us. All cooked well with strong authentic flavors. Worth the visit.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text:
Great restaurant , delicious food , only the price is a bit high
Anyway 5 stars because of the experience .

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text:
Had the take away menu, the lady tailored everything on my food allergies... In 1/2 an hour was ready and it was TOTALLY delicious!!
Seriously, forget the tasteless, boring glutenfree food you normally find, this …

Review Text: I did not know that african meals is very delicious. You must taste if you will be there

Name: Kilimanjaro

Review Text: Nothing fancy, but welcoming with artsy simple decor and leisurely-paced friendly service. Gives the impression of dining at a friend’s home. The menu is from across Africa and very good indeed. We combined a Ethiopian injera with a …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text:
Friendly staff, small restaurant, great atmosphere and tasty food.
Definitely different from the restaurants I normally go to and definitely deserves more customers. …

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Great place, authenticate food and wonderfully cheerful staff. Well worth a trip.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Delicious food, friendly prices, lovely people and a quiet old world charm in the heart of bustling Amsterdam. Definitely a place to go back to.... The menu had multiple options out of Ethiopian, Cameroon, Kenya, Sudan, Mali, Egypt, Morocco, Eritrea, Tanzanian dishes.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Such amazing food and service. Beautiful smell and decoration. Highly recommended!!! Thank you xx

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Amazing food, glutenfree injera and delicious vegan mix. Very nice staff as well!!!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: This has been my favourite restaurant for years. The food is superb and the service is even better. I always leave here fully satisfied, but also so happy about the entire experience. I have been coming here for years and I'm sure I will keep bringing new people to introduce to your amazing restaurant!

Review Text: For girls, one portion would be enough. cozy environment and friendly staff

Review Text: Don't have enough words to review this place. 5 stars on all aspects. Food was so delicious and the hospitality was excellent. I'm glad we found this place, it would have been a terrible loss if he hadn't. Highly recommended. Also the food is freshly cooked by the hostess's mom. Yumm!

Review Text: Delicious food and amazing service! The waiter understood exactly what we needed and when we needed it and she was proactive on that :)

Review Text: We were four and had two veggie and two meat dishes, they were exceptional! Especially the yellow lentils, the wine options could be improved, overall the food was homely and the setting cozy.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Well worth going out of your way for. They have a good Ethiopian menu and tour of the rest of Africa. The lamb tagine is highly recommended. Book before coming at the weekends.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Fantastic food and service for a very good price. Went there on a peaceful Sunday afternoon and was treated with some of the best injera, coconut bear and new-age African music ever. Would definitely be back.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Perfect Place to enjoy some pretty authentic African Food - loved the cozy place, the really special service and the Love that was brought to us. You definitely have to order the Ethiopian coffee!

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Excellent Food, Extremely  nice Service. It has been our pleasure. If you want to experience great african food -> the Kilimanjaro is the Place to be.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: I have been to many Ethiopian restaurants and Kilimanjaro is still my favourite. Try the Temtemo lentil injera - spicy and full of flavour. Their coconut ice cream surrounded by freshly cut pineapple, mango and passion fruit is wonderful.The staff are kind and friendly, too.

Name: Kilimanjaro
Review Text: Walking distance from where I stayed, Kilimanjaro offers authentic food from all over Africa.  A South African cabernet paired with their African salad started my meal off nicely which I finished with Injera Mixed - the best of all the …

Review Text: One of the best or the best Ethiopian restaurant in Amsterdam. If you're visiting the city, i recommend  you to pass and try the mix injera!! but also all the rest of the dishes!
